data.name: The Highway Code - Driving Test Success
data.detailed_description:
ESSENTIAL READING FOR ALL ROAD USERS
A thorough understanding of The Highway Code is essential for all road users and will help ensure that you use the roads safely and legally.

REVISE ANYTIME, ANYWHERE!
All road users, not just learners, need to know the rules and regulations within the Highway Code. Plus it's essential that you can recognise and respond to EVERY road sign in the UK. Failure to do so could lead to fines, penalty points or even the loss of your licence.

Fully updated in line with all the recent changes.

This content requires the Adobe Reader

data.short_description: Read, search and print the latest digital edition of The Highway Code for UK road users.

fullgame.name: Driving Theory Test UK 2017/18 - Driving Test Success

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any internet enabled device capable of displaying a PDF file, including smartphone, tablet, Mac, PC running Windows 1,8.1 or 10
  • Processor: N/A
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: To view this eBook you will need PDF viewing software installed on your device. Acrobat Reader is free and available to download at https://get.adobe.com/uk/reader
